messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi, I need to change my laptop order to be shipped to my NYC address, but I don't want to share the address here. Also, I want to modify the laptop specs to have an i5 processor, 256GB SSD storage, and space grey color. Additionally, I want to exchange my watch to have a black dial but keep the leather strap. Can you help me with these changes?

message.content: Hi, I need to change my laptop order to be shipped to my NYC address, but I don't want to share the address here. Also, I want to modify the laptop specs to have an i5 processor, 256GB SSD storage, and space grey color. Additionally, I want to exchange my watch to have a black dial but keep the leather strap. Can you help me with these changes?
